meanings.definition: A person who investigates crimes and gathers information
meanings.sent1: The detectives solved the mystery by finding important clues.
meanings.sent2: The detectives were determined to uncover the truth behind the robbery.
meanings.sent3: The detectives' magnifying glass made them look like curious explorers.
meanings.sent4: The detectives' sharp instincts led them straight to the culprit.
meanings.sent5: The detectives' teamwork made them a formidable force in solving cases.

meanings.definition: To discover or identify the presence or existence of something
meanings.sent1: She carefully detectives the hidden treasure buried in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The scientist detectives the rare species of plants in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: He detectives the missing sock under the bed, much to his relief.
meanings.sent4: The telescope detectives distant stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The detective work of the archaeologist uncovered ancient artifacts.
